text: Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME) privacy policy
Overview
Tencent Music Entertainment Group (hereinafter referred to as "TME") depends on user information security and privacy protection as its own "lifeline".

We adhere to the concept of "all user values are based on", and we are committed to improving the transparency of information processing, enhancing your convenience of information management, and ensuring your information and communication security.
label: Data Security

text: TME strictly abides by relevant laws and regulations, follow the following principles of privacy protection to provide you with more secure and reliable services:
label: Data Security

text: · Safe and reliable: We do our best to prevent your information from being leaked, damaged, or lost through reasonable and effective information security technology and management processes.
label: Data Security

text: · Autonomous choice: We provide you with convenient information management options so that you can make appropriate choices and manage your personal information.
label: Data Security

text: · Protecting communication secrets: We strictly follow laws and regulations, protect your communication secrets, and provide you with secure communication services.
label: Data Security

text: · Reasonable necessity: In order to provide better services to you and other users, we only collect the necessary information.
label: Data Security

text: · Clear and transparent: We strive to use simple and easy -to -understand expressions to introduce you privacy policies in order to clearly understand our information processing methods.
label: Data Security

text: · Incorporate privacy protection into product design: We are integrated into the concept of privacy protection in all aspects of product or service development, comprehensive law, product, design and other factors.
label: Data Security

text: This "Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME) Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy") mainly explains what information we collect, the purpose of our collection information, and the rights you enjoy.
I hope you can read this policy carefully and learn more about our collection and use of information in order to better understand our products or services and make appropriate choices.
This policy will help you understand the following:
1. What necessary information do we collect
2. How do we use collected information
3. How do we use cookie and related technologies
4. The information you share
5. How do you manage your information
6. The information we share
7. The information we may send to you
8. The location and period of storage information
9. Information security
10. Protection of minors
11. Scope of application
12. Contact us
13. Change
If you use it, TME's products or services, it means you agree with what we described in this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
Risk

text: If you or your guardian does not agree with any content of this policy, you should stop using it immediately.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If you or your guardian does not agree with any content of this policy, you should stop using it immediately.

text: If you have any questions, please contact us.
The first part of the relevant definition
Phone number, etc.

Personal sensitive information: It refers to personal information such as leakage, illegal provision or abuse that may endanger people's body and property, which can easily lead to personal information that causes personal reputation, physical and mental health, or discriminatory treatment.
For example, personal sensitive information includes identity documents, personal biometric information, bank accounts, communication content, health and physiological information, etc.
Equipment: It refers to a device that can be used to access the TME service, such as desktop computers, laptops, tablet computers or smartphones.

The only device identifier (exclusive ID or UUID): refers to a string of characters in the device from the device manufacturer, which can be used to identify the corresponding device in a unique way (such as the IMEI number of the mobile phone).
The only device identifier has a variety of uses, which can be used to provide advertisements when COOKIES (eg is in mobile applications).
Cookie: It is a neutral technology that allows website server to store data on the client or read data from the client.
The Cookie file is a file with information related to the user's access to the website. The format is .txt.
Cookie content is usually encrypted.
Safe Cookie technology will provide users with more convenient services when surfing the Internet.
IP address: Each internet device specifies a number called the Internet protocol (IP) address.
These numbers are usually specified according to geographical areas.
IP addresses can usually be used to identify the location where device is connected to the Internet.
GPS: The abbreviation of Global Positioning System (Global Positioning System).
The GPS signal receiver on the device you use can receive the signal from the GPS satellite and use the information to calculate your location.
WiFi: Wi-Fi is a technology that allows electronic devices to connect to a wireless LAN (WLAN), which is usually what we call wireless networks.

Base station: That is, public mobile communication base stations are a form of radio station station. It refers to a radio receipt of information transmission between information transmission between the mobile phone terminal through a mobile communication exchange center in a certain radio coverage area.

TLS: TLS (Transport Layer Security), also known as a security transmission layer protocol, consists of TLS Record and TLS Handshake for providing confidentiality and data completeness between two communication applications.Essence
SSL: SSL (Secure Socket Layer), also known as convergence, is a security protocol implemented on the transmission communication protocol (TCP/IP).
SSL supports various types of networks, and also provides three basic security services. Both use public key and symmetrical key technology to achieve the effect of information confidentiality.
Information collection technology: The "Automatic Collection" described in the Privacy Policy in Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME) includes the following ways:
(1) Cookie (cookie file)
Cookie is a small text file in the client (your computer, mobile phone, or other smart terminals) when you browse the web. It can be used to improve your experience.
(2) Web Beacon (network beacon)

Web Beacon is an electronic image file case or other technologies embedded in the website or email. It can be used to calculate the number of visitors, record whether you read emails or websites, or use some cookies.
(3) Log Files (Log File)
Several data for automatic collection of LOG FILES storage.
These data include the Internet protocol (IP) address, browser type, Internet service provider (ISP), reference /exit page, operating system, date /time stamp, and click stream data.
(4) ET TAG (physical tag)

ET TAG is the HTTP protocol header that is transmitted behind the Internet browse and the Internet server, which can replace Cookie to track individual users, so that we can understand and improve our services more deeply.
(5)JavaScript
JavaScript is a programming language for making more interactive and dynamic web pages.
JavaScript can set cookies, read cookies, and delete cookies.

Related Company: Refers to the operator of Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME) and other products of the company or other companies that are related to TME.Entertainment (Shenzhen) Co., Ltd., Guangzhou Cool Dog Computer Technology Co., Ltd., Beijing Kuwu Technology Co., Ltd., Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd., etc.).

"Related relationship" refers to the subject (including individuals, companies, organizations, or other entities), which is directly or indirectly controlled by the subject, or the subject that is directly or indirectly controlled, or directly or indirectly as the same subject.Control subject.

The aforementioned "control" refers to the power or other relationships that directly or indirectly have the power or other relationships that have instructed others by holding voting rights, contracts or other methods to directly or indirectly have other relationships that instructions or instructions that to make instructions.

Products or services: Refers to the platforms or products of Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME) (including QQ music, cool dog music, cool me music, national K song, cool dog live broadcast, Cool me Julxing, Tencent musician, 5SING and othersThe products or services provided by TME), applications, clients, services and tools.

text: 9.4, if security incidents such as personal information leakage occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent the security incident from expanding, and inform you in the form of push notifications and announcements.

Data Security

text: Ten, minor protection
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors.
label: Specific Audiences

text: According to the relevant laws and regulations, if you are, minors under the age of 18, before using, TME's products or services, you should obtain the consent of your parents or legal guardians in advance.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a minor under the age of 18, you should obtain the consent of your parents or legal guardians before using TME products or services.

text: If you are the guardian of minors, when you have any questions about the personal information of the minors you monitor, please contact us through the contact information in part 12.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are the guardian of the minor, when you have any questions about the personal information of the minors you monitor, please contact us.

text: 11. Scope of application
All our products or services are applicable to this policy.

However, some products or services may have its specific privacy guidelines /statements. The specific privacy guidance /declaration more specifically illustrates how we handle your information in the service.
If this policy is inconsistent with the privacy guidelines /declarations of specific services, please refer to this specific privacy guideline /declaration.
Please note that this policy does not apply products or services provided by other companies or individuals.
If you use these third -party products or services, you must be subject to the third -party privacy policy (rather than this policy), and you need to read its policy content carefully.
Twelve, contact us
If you have any questions about this policy or other related matters, please contact us, http://kf.qq.com/.
label: Important
Contact Information

text: 13. Change
We may amend the content of this policy in a timely manner.
label: Policy Change

text: If such changes will cause the substantial loss of rights under this policy, we will notify you by prompting a prominent position on the page before the change of the page, sending emails to you.
